name: FUTURE Hit
description:
Made for OLC Game Jam 2021. theme FUTURE.

A projectile is set to fly of and bounce around the screen. Your job is simple, place out small balloons/circles that should be hit. But the order of the hits are important. The tricky bit is that the order is not known from the start but revealed over time as you place things. So you have to plan for the FUTURE.

Can you beat the 10 levels? What will the future hold?

Should be able to be run on mobile devices, though tapping to place things is not as easy and precise. Maybe that will be your ultimate challenge.
